title: Server
body: I just moved to India and I made an account in North america on the NA server, can I switch servers and still have all my champions?

replies.body:
If you transfer your account to another Riot-controlled region, yes. We have a guide on transferring your account which can be found [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
So really the answer is no, because there is no Riot controlled server in Asia that is open to play on. Right?
